asap.emitterengine

Class Emitter

  • java.lang.Object
    • asap.emitterengine.Emitter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BlinkEmitter, BreathingEmitter

    public abstract class Emitter
extends java.lang.Object
    Emits bml behaviors to a RealizerPort.
    Author:
    Dennis Reidsma

      • start

        public abstract void start()
        start emitter. Needs to be already connected to realizerport.

      • stop

        public abstract void stop()
        stop and clean up emitter as soon as possible. After stop was called, no new BML should be emitted, but cleaning up emission threads may take a while.
